jopt.csp.spi.search.localsearch
Class SwapNeighborhood

java.lang.Object
  jopt.csp.spi.search.localsearch.SwapNeighborhood
All Implemented Interfaces:
jopt.csp.search.Neighborhood
public class SwapNeighborhood
extends java.lang.Object
implements jopt.csp.search.Neighborhood

Creates a neighbor hood where each neighbor selects one variable from the initial solution and swaps its value with another variable.

Version:
$Revision: 1.5 $
Author:
Nick Coleman
See Also:
BrowseNeighborhoodAction
